text:
*You were taking a leisurely stroll through the park...*
A sudden, ear-splitting roar filled the air,
louder than thunder but with an odd mechanical edge to it,
The sky seemed to tear open as something massive and metallic
hurtled out of the clouds,

I approached cautiously,
drawn to the strange glow from the nearby forest,
where the ufo seemingly had landed.
The air felt thick, almost electric. The ship, sleek and alien,
A hatch was partially open, emitting a faint blue light.
Let's get to the good part...
